# Otávio Carvalho

> Personal blog of Otávio Carvalho — Distributed Systems engineer.

Otávio Carvalho is a Distributed Systems engineer, originally from Pelotas, Brazil and currently living in Barcelona, Spain. He has been focusing on distributed systems for applied engineering and research for more than 10 years.

Currently working as a Lead Engineer for New Relic focusing on Distributed Event Processing for the Entity Platform.

## Pages

- [About](https://otavio.cat/): About Otávio Carvalho
- [Blog](https://otavio.cat/posts/): Blog posts about distributed systems
- [Speaking](https://otavio.cat/speaking/): Conference talks and presentations
- [Contact](https://otavio.cat/contact/): Contact information
